name: BaseConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask base converter what 50 in base 3 is”
”Alexa, ask base converter to convert 1120 in base 3 to base 10”
”Alexa, ask base converter to change 126 to base 16”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: base converter
des: Base converter can turn any integer in base 2 through 10 into another base up to 36. This skill should run on all Alexa enabled hardware, and doesn't need any special accounts or hardware.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
